main_text:
(Trans) Gender Trouble
5. (Trans) Gender Trouble


 The impact of Judith Butler's Gender
Trouble: Feminism and the Subversion of Identity (1990) was
immediate and profound. Instead of being oppositional, the
ground-breaking work of Butler bears a much more complex relation to
transgender individuals and to trans studies.
hierarchy_title: Feminist Perspectives on Trans Issues || (Trans) Gender Trouble
